berger.author: Berger, E. D., Hollenbeck, C., Maj, P., Vitek, O., & Vitek, J.
berger.description: Dataset of labeled commits from Berger, E. D., Hollenbeck, C., Maj, P., Vitek, O., & Vitek, J. (2019). On the impact of programming languages on code quality: a reproduction study. ACM Transactions on Programming Languages and Systems (TOPLAS), 41(4), 1-24.

1151-commits.description: Dataset of manually-labeled 1k commits (corrective, perfective, adaptive) from Levin, S., & Yehudai, A. (2017, November). Boosting automatic commit classification into maintenance activities by utilizing source code changes. In Proceedings of the 13th International Conference on Predictive Models and Data Analytics in Software Engineering (pp. 97-106).

200k-commits-1k.description:
Dataset of commits mined by J. Prenner from Github (truncated to first 1k commits).
 Cite: @article{babii2021mining,
  title={Mining Software Repositories with a Collaborative Heuristic Repository},
  author={Babii, Hlib and Prenner, Julian Aron and Stricker, Laurin and Karmakar, Anjan and Janes, Andrea and Robbes, Romain},
  journal={arXiv preprint arXiv:2103.01722},
  year={2021}
}

200k-commits-issues.description:
Dataset of issues linked to commits mined by J. Prenner from Github.
 Cite: @article{babii2021mining,
  title={Mining Software Repositories with a Collaborative Heuristic Repository},
  author={Babii, Hlib and Prenner, Julian Aron and Stricker, Laurin and Karmakar, Anjan and Janes, Andrea and Robbes, Romain},
  journal={arXiv preprint arXiv:2103.01722},
  year={2021}
}

200k-commits-files.description:
Dataset of commits (file changes) mined by J. Prenner from Github.
 Cite: @article{babii2021mining,
  title={Mining Software Repositories with a Collaborative Heuristic Repository},
  author={Babii, Hlib and Prenner, Julian Aron and Stricker, Laurin and Karmakar, Anjan and Janes, Andrea and Robbes, Romain},
  journal={arXiv preprint arXiv:2103.01722},
  year={2021}
}

200k-commits-link-issues.description:
Dataset of commits (links from commits to issues) mined by J. Prenner from Github.
 Cite: @article{babii2021mining,
  title={Mining Software Repositories with a Collaborative Heuristic Repository},
  author={Babii, Hlib and Prenner, Julian Aron and Stricker, Laurin and Karmakar, Anjan and Janes, Andrea and Robbes, Romain},
  journal={arXiv preprint arXiv:2103.01722},
  year={2021}
}

smells-train_10.description: Dataset of manually classified code smells (truncated to first 10 data points) from Madeyski, L., & Lewowski, T. (2020). MLCQ: Industry-relevant code smell data set. In Proceedings of the Evaluation and Assessment in Software Engineering (pp. 342-347).

smells-test_10.description: Dataset of manually classified code smells (truncated to first 10 data points) from Madeyski, L., & Lewowski, T. (2020). MLCQ: Industry-relevant code smell data set. In Proceedings of the Evaluation and Assessment in Software Engineering (pp. 342-347).
